summary: This is an email exchange between defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim and Mark S. Cohen regarding the drafting and filing of a joint letter in the case U.S. v. Maxwell. The email includes a draft attachment and discusses filing plans.

persons.name: Mark S. Cohen
persons.context: Appears to be coordinating with defense counsel on drafting and filing a joint letter in the U.S. v. Maxwell case.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: The sender of the email, representing the defense in U.S. v. Maxwell, inquiring about and receiving a draft joint letter.

connections.description: Coordinating on drafting and filing a joint legal letter in the U.S. v. Maxwell case.

events.title: Drafting of joint letter in U.S. v. Maxwell
events.description: Legal counsel exchange a draft joint letter regarding a defense request related to the MDC warden, with plans to file it.

keyFacts: The document is an email exchange between attorneys Mark S. Cohen and Bobbi C. Sternheim regarding the U.S. v. Maxwell case.
The subject involves a defense request related to the MDC (Metropolitan Detention Center) warden.
A draft letter titled '2020-12-01_GMJetter regarding_defense_request_re_MDC_warden.pdf' is attached to the email.
The filing of the joint letter was planned for 7:30 PM on December 1, 2020, unless otherwise communicated.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings and coordination between defense counsel during the COVID-19 pandemic, with remote work protocols in place.
